name: Rosebud AI
headline: Make games at the speed of thought.
description:
Rosebud is building the AI Roblox. We will make it 1000X easier for a community of game devs to create and enjoy the games of their dreams.
‍
We’re a team of PhD researchers, creatives and engineers building the generative AI platform to enable game creation at the speed of thought. We believe all media creation will be done via generative methods in a few years. We're building that future.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:machine-learning; industry:gaming; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Lisha Li, Founder
founders.description:
Building Rosebud AI. 
Machine Learning PhD UC Berkeley, turned AI investor (principal @ Amplify Partners) turned founder.

# ROSEBUD AI
Go from Text Description to
RPG|
## Craft Worlds with Words.
[Let’s Create](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/play.rosebud.ai/tutorial?tutorial-id=40281b2b-8402-4ae8-a0b0-2bad2ee4c804&utm_source=tutorial-home-hero-button&utm_medium=tutorial-home-hero-button&utm_campaign=Tutorial+Home+Hero+Button&utm_id=tutorial-home-hero-button>)![Decorative sparkles on the button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c9e4c6cfce6029a3d58e3e/66df054d89b412a4617d4ca8_sparkle.svg)
[See how it Works](http://rosebud.ai/<#>)
## DEMO VIDEO
## Case Studies
![Illustration of a close embrace between a man and a woman, with the woman looking upward and the man's forehead touching hers.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c9e4c6cfce6029a3d58e3e/662917e1738f6577cd0ce022_ai-visual-novel-game.webp)
### TALK TO AI CHARACTERS
Engage in conversations with AI characters and experience interactive stories like never before.
[CHAT NOW](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/play.rosebud.ai/g/ai-characters?utm_source=rosebudai-feature-games&utm_medium=rosebudai-feature-games>)
![Illustration of a figure in a futuristic spacesuit suspended inside a large green liquid-filled chamber in a high-tech lab.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c9e4c6cfce6029a3d58e3e/673f643e8d4b9f7c40aaa168_3d-game-maker-ai.webp)
### 3D GAME MAKER
Transform your ideas into 3D games: create worlds and gameplay with the help of Rosie, our AI assistant.
[Create 3D Game](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/play.rosebud.ai/g/3d?utm_source=rosebudai-feature-games-3d&utm_medium=rosebudai-feature-games-3d&utm_campaign=3D+Feature&utm_id=rosebudai-feature-games-3d>)
![Illustration of a young woman with glasses and a lab coat standing confidently in a brightly lit laboratory.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c9e4c6cfce6029a3d58e3e/662915aae60a299a5abe4e42_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(12\).webp)
### AI FOR EDUCATION
Enable your students to craft captivating games through creative conversations.
[CREATE GAME](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/play.rosebud.ai/g/education?utm_source=rosebudai-feature-games&utm_medium=rosebudai-feature-games>)
## USER STORIES
[![3D Battle Cars Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/674103161d740c082480b18a_3d-game-success-story.webp)3D Battle Cars Template](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/meet-lord-boots-pushing-the-limits-of-ai-game-dev>)
![@Lord Boots](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/674103c34539218bcfed2384_3d-game-creator.png)
@Lord Boots
“I'm quite fond of my 3D projects! You must keep your code ordered and easy to read for both you and the AI”.
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/meet-lord-boots-pushing-the-limits-of-ai-game-dev>)
[![Pixel art futuristic warrior in armor standing in a neon-lit cityscape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/671762d7bf0596a1f7ba335b_6614982f7d42bd35ffb27195_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(89\)-p-500.webp)Digital Battle Arena](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/from-coding-novice-to-ai-game-creator>)
![@OriginalCen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/671762e15db0f30c0155146a_66162cbda8cf52b599d79d90_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(2\).jpg)
@OriginalCen
“Rosebud has helped me do a lot and think in creative ways, I'm literally addicted”
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/from-coding-novice-to-ai-game-creator>)
[![Three stylized female characters with different outfits and backgrounds, set against a retro-futuristic neon grid.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6717624882a9f6ccf32f8547_665e5f0638a586a307581f07_Dise%C3%B1o%20sin%20t%C3%ADtulo\(208\)-p-500.jpg)AI Characters](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-success-story-from-solo-tutorials-to-rosebud-team>)
![@Jason](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/671762572506a655b5cfbf61_665e5fa7c8908f9add6a534b_Dise%C3%B1o%20sin%20t%C3%ADtulo\(209\).jpg)
@Jason
"Thanks to Rosebud taking care of game dev issues, so much more will be possible".
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-success-story-from-solo-tutorials-to-rosebud-team>)
[![Evening's Embrace](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6761d3d860d9f0ae636018e7_ai-visual-novel-game.webp)Evening's Embrace](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/mastering-ai-development-joels-journey-into-web-creation>)
![@Del Chupenebray](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6761d47b98e5af486f9487bc_succes-story.jpg)
@Del Chupenebray
“With Rosebud I can grab a few things, throw them together, and quickly get a working prototype”
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/mastering-ai-development-joels-journey-into-web-creation>)
[![Grid of watercolor flower paintings, featuring blossoms in various colors on a floral background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/67176327a287c4a917f91b24_66162ed9640b477e92d5bad5_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(3\)-p-500.jpg)MEMORY FLOWER](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/success-story-mindful-ai-game-creation>)
![@Izzy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6717633fad1778a602026479_66162f96a8cf52b599d9f401_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(4\).jpg)
@Izzy
"I found using Rosebud very easy, as long as the prompt is simple all is working for me"
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/success-story-mindful-ai-game-creation>)
[![Pixel art astronaut flying with a jetpack above alien creatures on a planet with mountains in the background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/67176377f740b097787190ec_66149571b7a6695ac5fa7005_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(88\)-p-500.png)Astro jetpack](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-success-story-arjun-ai-text-to-game>)
![@LaughingMan](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/67176388b684c8aad0c890bf_661494f5cbcc6c4f8c7cbe91_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(87\).png)
@LaughingMan
“Since the AI can type faster, you can think while the AI is coming up with the code”
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-success-story-arjun-ai-text-to-game>)
[![Pixel art game scene with characters including a mushroom, a cat-like figure, and several goblin-like enemies on a grid.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/671763e93caa6de1a94ed2d9_66149104342fadb109850d16_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(86\)-p-500.png)Pixel Cataclysm](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-beta-tester-feel-the-joy-of-creating-your-game-with-ai>)
![@JP](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/671763f2f5d313176cbaf8f8_661490a2a88e95f4c5f23b02_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(85\).png)
@JP
“Once I understood the full potential of the tool, it was super cool”
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-beta-tester-feel-the-joy-of-creating-your-game-with-ai>)
[![A bear pushing a shopping cart in a grocery store aisle with nearly empty shelves. Grizzly Bear Bargains game built on Rosebud AI ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6717644a3ba13eac8f23ff7c_66988eba3a89b1bf10cbacf2_ai-game-bear-p-500.webp)Grizzly Bear Bargains](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/from-mario-maker-to-rosebud-ai>)
![@Radio_Biscuit](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6717645da39e506562233527_66988e266b599bd9d2e46067_ai-game-dev-success-story.png)
@Radio_Biscuit
“I'm feeling pretty good about how fast Rosebud seems to be progressing”
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/from-mario-maker-to-rosebud-ai>)
[![Five silhouetted figures standing on clouds surrounding a glowing vortex, with flowers and vines framing the scene.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6717649babb191b424b445f6_667631422a6f276c22055fd6_rogue-dreamer-ai-game-p-500.jpg)Rogue Dreamers](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/cocos-coding-journey-fun-and-success-with-rosebud>)
![@CoCo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/671764bb91fcff9b171c7f98_667630d7c142b79bf65dd81a_coco-success-story.png)
@CoCo
“When I started, I had no idea I would have created anything that I have created so far!”
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/cocos-coding-journey-fun-and-success-with-rosebud>)
[![Pixel art character standing in front of a cave wall in a game scene with scattered gems and obstacles. Stonewarp game built with Rosebud AI ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6717650ab5aceca850fea6ca_66148df443efadd38a38388e_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(83\)-p-500.png)Stonewarp](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-beta-tester-ai-errors-are-a-source-of-ideas>)
![@abrie](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d4fd4fde0a4c6508db25aa/6717651f912d60d1ebb84d52_66148ea506731cba140afd16_Disen%CC%83o%20sin%20ti%CC%81tulo\(84\).png)
@abrie
“I love the way AI enables rapid iteration. Also, the errors are a good source of ideas!”
[learn more](http://rosebud.ai/<https:/www.rosebud.ai/blog/rosebud-beta-tester-ai-errors-are-a-source-of-ideas>)

generated_description:
**Rosebud AI: Revolutionizing Game Development**

Rosebud AI, founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator’s S19 batch, aims to transform the world of game development. The company's mission is simple yet ambitious: "Make games at the speed of thought." Located in the heart of San Francisco, this innovative startup consists of a tight-knit team of 10 PhD researchers, creatives, and engineers dedicated to harnessing the power of generative AI for game creation.

### The Vision

Initially launched as a platform likened to "AI Roblox," Rosebud AI is striving to democratize game development. They're working to make it 1000 times easier for developers and gamers alike to bring their dream games to life. The team believes we're on the brink of a future where all media creation will pivot towards generative techniques. They're not just envisioning this future—they're building it.

### Key Offerings

Rosebud AI provides a suite of powerful tools:

1. **3D Game Maker**: This feature helps users create immersive worlds through an intuitive interface.
2. **Visual Novel Maker**: Users can craft interactive narratives and engage with AI characters, creating a unique interactive experience.
3. **AI NPCs and Characters**: Create dynamic non-player characters and engage in dialogues with AI characters that can adapt and respond.
4. **Educational Tools**: The platform enables students to explore game development creatively, enhancing learning through interactive projects.

With their tools, users can go from mere text descriptions to fully playable role-playing games (RPGs), making creativity more accessible than ever.

### User-Centric Approach

Rosebud AI thrives on the feedback of its users. Gamers and developers from various backgrounds share their success stories—testimonies highlight how Rosebud has transformed their approach to game development. Users express gratitude for the platform's ability to enable rapid iteration and creative exploration, fostering a newfound passion for game creation.

### Looking Ahead

With a clear outlook on the future—blending creativity with the latest advancements in AI—Rosebud AI is plotting a course that could redefine how games are made. By prioritizing speed and accessibility, they are positioned not only to lead in the gaming industry but to revolutionize it entirely.

For more information on their offerings or to dive into the future of game development, check out their [official website](http://rosebud.ai). Whether you’re a seasoned developer or just starting, Rosebud AI invites you to craft your virtual worlds with unprecedented ease.
